text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Otjozondjupa Region | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | mottoeng = | image_map = Otjozondjupa in Namibia.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of the Otjozondjiupa Region in Namibia | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Namibia | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Otjiwarongo | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 105,460 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 143,903 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone = CAT | utc_offset = +2 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Otjozondjupa is a region in Namibia. The capital is Otjiwarongo. Waterberg Plateau Park is in the region. James Uerikua became Governor in 2020. There are 7 constituencies: * Grootfontein * Okahandja * Okakarara * Omatako * Otavi * Otjiwarongo * Tsumkwe ==References==
title: Otjozondjupa Region
